entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
